datasets.name: 8ab1ca38
datasets.query:
select 
    date,
      unique_clicks,
    total_delivered,
    total_sent,
    total_opens,
    total_clicks,
    total_optouts,
    total_spam,
    sum(unique_clicks) OVER (ORDER BY date RANGE BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS clicks_t7d,
    sum(total_delivered) OVER (ORDER BY date RANGE BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS delivered_t7d,
    sum(unique_clicks) OVER (ORDER BY date RANGE BETWEEN 27 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS clicks_t28d,
    sum(total_delivered) OVER (ORDER BY date RANGE BETWEEN 27 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS delivered_t28d,
    sum(unique_clicks) OVER (ORDER BY date RANGE BETWEEN 90 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS clicks_t91d,
    sum(total_delivered) OVER (ORDER BY date RANGE BETWEEN 90 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS delivered_t91d,
    unique_clicks / total_delivered as ctr,
    total_delivered / total_sent AS delivery_rate,
    total_optouts / total_delivered AS optout_rate,
    total_spam / total_delivered AS spam_rate,
    clicks_t7d / delivered_t7d as ctr_t7d,
    clicks_t28d / delivered_t28d as ctr_t28d,
    clicks_t91d / delivered_t91d as ctr_t91d
 from `mozuca`.`did2025`.metrics_daily_rolling
WHERE
    date >= :start_date AND
    date <= :end_date

datasets.name: d9196d0a
datasets.query:
SELECT 
    e.campaign_id,
    first(c.campaign_name) as campaign_name,
    first(c.campaign_description) as campaign_description,
    first(c.cost) as cost,
    first(c.start_date) as start_date,
    first(c.end_date) as end_date,
    to_timestamp(first(c.start_date)) as _start_date,
    to_timestamp(first(c.end_date)) as _end_date,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'sent' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_sent,
    SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_delivered,
    SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'spam' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_spam,
    SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'html_open' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_opens,
    SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'optout_click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_optouts,
    SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_clicks,
    count(distinct case when e.event_type = 'click' then e.contact_id end) as unique_clicks,
    unique_clicks / total_delivered as ctr,
    format_number(ctr, '##.##%') as ctr_p,
    total_delivered / total_sent as delivery_rate,
    format_number(delivery_rate, '##.##%') as delivery_rate_p,
    total_optouts / total_delivered as optouts_rate,
    format_number(optouts_rate, '##.##%') as optouts_rate_p,
    total_spam / total_delivered as spam_rate,
    format_number(spam_rate, '##.##%') as spam_rate_p,
    sum(p.employees) as total_employees
FROM 
    `mozuca`.`did2025`.events e
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.campaigns c on e.campaign_id = c.campaign_id
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.contacts ct on e.contact_id = ct.contact_id
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.prospects p on ct.prospect_id = p.prospect_id
GROUP BY 
    e.campaign_id
HAVING
    _start_date >= :start_date AND
    _end_date <= :end_date
ORDER BY ctr desc, cost ASC

datasets.name: 023bfe11
datasets.query:
WITH CampaignData AS (
    SELECT 
        e.campaign_id,
        explode(collect_set(e.metadata.cta)) as cta,
        to_timestamp(first(c.start_date)) as _start_date,
        to_timestamp(first(c.end_date)) as _end_date,
        SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_delivered,
        count(distinct case when e.event_type = 'click' then e.contact_id end) as unique_clicks
        
    FROM 
        `mozuca`.`did2025`.events e
    INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.campaigns c on e.campaign_id = c.campaign_id
    INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.contacts ct on e.contact_id = ct.contact_id
    INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.prospects p on ct.prospect_id = p.prospect_id
    GROUP BY 
        e.campaign_id
)

SELECT sum(unique_clicks) as unique_clicks, cta, campaign_id
FROM CampaignData
WHERE 
    _start_date >= :start_date AND
    _end_date <= :end_date
GROUP BY cta, campaign_id
LIMIT 20

datasets.name: 09d20820
datasets.query:
SELECT 
    e.*,
    c.*,
    ct.*,
    p.*
FROM 
    `mozuca`.`did2025`.events e
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.campaigns c on e.campaign_id = c.campaign_id
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.contacts ct on e.contact_id = ct.contact_id
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.prospects p on ct.prospect_id = p.prospect_id
WHERE
    e.event_type = 'click' AND
    e.event_date >= :start_date AND
    e.event_date <= :end_date

datasets.name: 31bd8516
datasets.query:
SELECT 
    e.campaign_id,
    first(c.campaign_name) as campaign_name,
    first(c.campaign_description) as campaign_description,
    first(c.subject_line) as subject_line,
    first(c.template) as template,
    first(c.cost) as cost,
    first(c.start_date) as start_date,
    first(c.end_date) as end_date,
    to_timestamp(first(c.start_date)) as _start_date,
    to_timestamp(first(c.end_date)) as _end_date,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'sent' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_sent,
    SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_delivered,
    SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'spam' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_spam,
    SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'html_open' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_opens,
    SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'optout_click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_optouts,
    SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_clicks,
    count(distinct case when e.event_type = 'click' then e.contact_id end) as unique_clicks,
    unique_clicks / total_delivered as ctr,
    format_number(ctr, '##.##%') as ctr_p,
    total_delivered / total_sent as delivery_rate,
    format_number(delivery_rate, '##.##%') as delivery_rate_p,
    total_optouts / total_delivered as optouts_rate,
    format_number(optouts_rate, '##.##%') as optouts_rate_p,
    total_spam / total_delivered as spam_rate,
    format_number(spam_rate, '##.##%') as spam_rate_p,
    sum(p.employees) as total_employees
FROM 
    `mozuca`.`did2025`.events e
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.campaigns c on e.campaign_id = c.campaign_id
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.contacts ct on e.contact_id = ct.contact_id
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.prospects p on ct.prospect_id = p.prospect_id
GROUP BY 
    e.campaign_id
HAVING
    _start_date >= :start_date AND
    _end_date <= :end_date
ORDER BY ctr desc, cost ASC
LIMIT 20

datasets.name: 72b7d899
datasets.query:
SELECT 
    SUM(CASE WHEN event_type = 'sent' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_sent,
    SUM(CASE WHEN event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_delivered,
    SUM(CASE WHEN event_type = 'spam' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_spam,
    SUM(CASE WHEN event_type = 'html_open' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_opens,
    SUM(CASE WHEN event_type = 'optout_click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_optouts,
    SUM(CASE WHEN event_type = 'click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_clicks,
    count(distinct case when event_type = 'click' then contact_id end) as unique_clicks,
    format_number(unique_clicks / total_delivered, '##.##%') as ctr,
    format_number(total_delivered / total_sent, '##.##%') as delivery_rate,
    format_number(total_opens / total_sent, '##.##%') as opens_rate,
    format_number(total_optouts / total_delivered, '##.##%') as optouts_rate,
   format_number((total_sent-total_delivered) / total_sent, '##.##%') as bounce_rate,
    format_number(total_spam / total_delivered, '##.##%') as spam_rate
FROM 
    `mozuca`.`did2025`.events
WHERE
    event_date >= :start_date AND
    event_date <= :end_date

INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.campaigns c on e.campaign_id = c.campaign_id
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.contacts ct on e.contact_id = ct.contact_id
INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.prospects p on ct.prospect_id = p.prospect_id
WHERE
    e.event_date >= :start_date AND
    e.event_date <= :end_date

datasets.name: 625992b5
datasets.displayName: Sales by State with Total and Value Aggregation
datasets.query:
SELECT 
    Estado,
    COUNT(IDVendas) AS TotalVendas,
    SUM(ValorTransacao) AS ValorTotalVendas
FROM 
    daiwt24sp.default.fato_vendas_mascarada
GROUP BY 
    Estado
ORDER BY 
    ValorTotalVendas DESC;

datasets.name: d38300b1
datasets.query:
SELECT
  e.campaign_id,
  first(c.campaign_name) as campaign_name,
  first(c.campaign_description) as campaign_description,
  first(c.cost) as cost,
  first(c.start_date) as start_date,
  first(c.end_date) as end_date,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'sent' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_sent,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_delivered,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'spam' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_spam,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'html_open' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_opens,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'optout_click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_optouts,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_clicks,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'click' THEN e.contact_id END) AS unique_clicks,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'click' THEN e.contact_id END) / SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ctr,
  FORMAT_NUMBER(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'click' THEN e.contact_id END) / SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), '##.##%') AS ctr_p,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'sent' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS delivery_rate,
  FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'sent' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), '##.##%') AS delivery_rate_p,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'optout_click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS optouts_rate,
  FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'optout_click' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), '##.##%') AS optouts_rate_p,
  SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'spam' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS spam_rate,
  FORMAT_NUMBER(SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'spam' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_type = 'delivered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), '##.##%') AS spam_rate_p,
  SUM(p.employees) AS total_employees
FROM
  `mozuca`.`did2025`.events e
  INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.campaigns c ON e.campaign_id = c.campaign_id
  INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.contacts ct ON e.contact_id = ct.contact_id
  INNER JOIN `mozuca`.`did2025`.prospects p ON ct.prospect_id = p.prospect_id
GROUP BY
  e.campaign_id
ORDER BY
  ctr DESC
LIMIT 10

datasets.name: 00ef7052
datasets.displayName: Monthly Campaign Sales and Commission Summary
datasets.query:
SELECT 
    c.categoria AS tipo_campanha,
    DATE_TRUNC('month', v.data_venda) AS mes,
    COUNT(v.venda_id) AS total_vendas,
    SUM(v.quantidade) AS total_quantidade,
    SUM(v.valor_comissao) AS total_comissao
FROM 
    marcogarcia_demos.vendas.vendas v
JOIN 
    marcogarcia_demos.vendas.campanha c ON v.campanha_id = c.campanha_id
GROUP BY 
    c.categoria, DATE_TRUNC('month', v.data_venda)
ORDER BY 
    mes, tipo_campanha
